titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Eben S. Wheeler papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Detroit, Michigan, civil engineer, chief assistant engineer of the U. S. Board of Engineers on Deep Waterways, later changed to United States Engineer Office, U. S. War Department.
archdesc.scopecontent: Letterbook, 1903-1908, concerning administration of river and harbor projects in the Great Lakes; his report as chief engineer of the Nicaragua Canal Commission, 1898-1899; letter, 1889, describing discovery of early lock at Sault Ste. Marie; and miscellaneous.
